trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Stonecunning
entries: Whenever the dwarf makes an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, it is considered proficient in the History skill and add double its proficiency bonus to the check, instead of its normal proficiency bonus.

trait.name: Wall Barrier
entries: With every ally that is 5 feet away from the dwarf that has a shield, the dwarf gains a +1 to its AC (to a maximum of a +3 bonus). The dwarf must be wielding a shield to gain this benefit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dwarf makes two melee attacks, only one of which can be with its shield bash.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 ({@damage 1d8    +    2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10    +    2}) slashing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 ({@damage 1d4    +    2}) bludgeoning damage. If the target Large or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 ({@damage 1d6    +    2}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The dwarf adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the dwarf must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
